application

Class MainApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • application.MainApplication

  • public class MainApplication
extends javafx.application.Application
    This class is the Main class of the program. It launches the first (login-in) window when the program is run. It contains the methods and variables to load and save data from the xml files. The data is loaded into the Observable Lists.
    Author:
    David Rudolf, Joseph Courtley
